title: Process of expression of gene X 2

content.question: Predict the length of the mature gene X mRNA if the full-length gene is introduced and expressed in prokaryotic cells. Justify your prediction.

frqParts.text: Predict the length of the mature gene X mRNA if the full-length gene is introduced and expressed in prokaryotic cells. Justify your prediction.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
